title: NA speaker, deputy speaker condole sad demise of Tariq Aziz
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 17 (APP):National Assembly Speaker Asad Qaiser and Deputy Speaker Qasim Khan Suri Wednesday expressed grief and sorrow over the sad demise of prominent media personality Tariq Aziz.
In their condolence messages to Hajira Tariq, wife of Tariq Aziz, they prayed Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
They said today the country was deprived of a prominent writer, poet and television programme host.
